intro: Hi, my name is Hari Bhandari
about: and I am a self-taught software developer with a passion for solving real-life problems and improving my skills. I specialize in using modern web technologies, such as Reactjs for front-end development and Node.js for back-end, to create websites that look great, feel fantastic, and perform optimally. I am currently pursuing my Master's degree at the University of York.
aboutSecond:
I am currently working at Dashing Distribution Software where I have been fortunate to have the opportunity to grow and succeed rapidly. I joined the company as an intern and within just 10 weeks, I was promoted to a software engineer. In this role, I am responsible for building complex business web applications that help our clients manage their operations more efficiently.

Some of the projects I have worked on include an excess stock management system, a licensing portal that integrates with Stripe to allow customers to purchase licenses, and a user tracking system that enables us to monitor the active user count at any given time. I have also developed a calendar that is integrated with the main Dashing software, providing an additional layer of functionality to our clients.

I am proud of the work I have done so far at Dashing Distribution Software and I am constantly striving to improve and develop my skills to provide the best possible solutions for our clients.
